sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time/> <cooking_instructions>1. Heat vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 2. Add minced garlic and sliced bird's eye chili, cook until fragrant. 3. Add thinly sliced chicken breast and cook until browned and cooked through. 4. Stir in cooked rice and toss to combine. 5. Add soy sauce, fish sauce, and brown sugar. Stir well. 6. Tear Thai basil leaves and add to the skillet. Cook until wilted. 7. Serve hot, garnished with a fried egg if desired.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Thai">8b495a179791021069a3b6fce053afd0</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Cooked Rice (2 cups, preferably day-old)</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Dinner">ca8516df9751021069a3b6fce053afdf</meal_type> <name>Thai Basil Fried Rice</name> <nutrition>Calories: 400, Protein: 25g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 35g</nutrition> <owned_by/> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Thinly slice chicken breast. 2. Mince garlic. 3. Slice bird's eye chili.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time/> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7891d71f9795021069a3b6fce053afeb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-04-07 01:22:04</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
